name: t02_shared_header_macros
description: Heavy use of macros and static inline helpers defined in a shared header. Multiple TUs include the header, creating duplicated code locations in DWARF.
oracle_pressure: Static inline functions appear in DWARF for each TU that includes the header. At O1+ these get inlined: expect RANGES_FRAGMENTED, MULTI_FILE_RANGE warnings. Macro-expanded code has no DWARF name â€” oracle may emit NAME_MISSING
